question: You have a friend who lives abroad. You have decided to apply for a course at one of the colleges in his city.Write to your friend explainingTell them about the college and the course and why you want to do it.Ask for their help to find accommodation if you get admission to the course.
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am excited to write this letter as I have decided to apply for a Master's degree at  UBC university which is there at your place.Hence, I would  love to inform you about my next move in my career.

As you know,  UBC university is the best and a reputed institution, In addition, we have mesmerizing programs for international students. On the other hand, the two years course which I would like to take prefer is having  phenomenal opportunities. Therefore, I strongly decided to pursue  my higher degree at  UBC. Last but not the least, the fee structure and payment plans are very friendly and also we have the flexibility to pay the fee after the graduation is completed.

I am more worried about my stay and other expenses since Vancouver is very costly and daily expenses are skyrocketing and I need your help to find the best  accommodation if I get  admission to UBC. I am ready to be in shared accommodation if there is an option. I may not get into fabulous and lavish places but please do not hesitate to look at small and medium budget places.
I look forward to seeing your response and I cannot wait to come there and start my education.
